title: Xbox Game Pass Hits 18 Million Subscribers - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.27.21
description:
Blessing and Imran tackle a big news day. On the agenda: Xbox Game Pass numbers, a new Skate 4 studio, Kevin Hart in the Borderlands movie, and more.

00:00:00 - Start
00:01:10 - What is Greg Miller trying to tell us about our next big potential payday? -  Best Friends Q: Nick from NY (It's still snowing)
00:07:00 - Housekeeping
Our review of The Medium is now up as a new episode of Kinda Funny XCast. You can catch Snowbike Mike, Parris, Tim, and Greg over there breaking down their thoughts on the game.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:10:46 - Xbox Game Pass subscribers hit 18 million - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:19:45 -  EA announces a new studio for Skate 4 - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:23:55 - Hitman 3 has already recouped its development costs - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:32:30 - The Medium Review Round Up
00:37:40 - Is Game Pass, by removing a real value proposition, lowering the bar for 'good' content to 'good enough' content? - Best Friends Q:Chris
00:42:35 - Kevin Hart is playing Roland in the upcoming Borderlands movie - Wesley Yin-Poole @ Eurogamer
00:49:18 - Netflix Orders a 'Tomb Raider' Anime Series - Aaron Couch @ Hollywood Reporter
00:54:56 - Out today
00:57:00 -  Ad
 Reader mail   -
00:57:50 - So with Control being now on Gamepass and on list for PS+ games, did we freak out over nothing? - Frankfurtter
01:00:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
